mapper.select: SELECT id,name,latitude,longitude FROM geo_position WHERE (latitude BETWEEN #{minLat} AND #{maxLat}) AND (longitude BETWEEN #{minLng} AND #{maxLng})

SELECT id,name,latitude,longitude, SQRT(POWER(ABS(#{0} - latitude)*111, 2) + POWER(ABS(#{1} - longitude)*111*COS(RADIANS(#{0})),2))*1000 as distance FROM geo_position WHERE SQRT(POWER(ABS(#{0} - latitude)*111, 2) + POWER(ABS(#{1} - longitude)*111*COS(RADIANS(#{0})),2))*1000 < #{2} order by distance limit 0,50
